languages.text: {n}Маражай, на доспехе которого красуется пара вмятин, гортанно смеется.{/n} "Ну же, что за промедление? Пора бы уже закончить наш маленький танец!"
{n}Marazhai, whose armour is dented in a few places, lets out a guttural laugh.{/n} "What are you waiting for? It is about time we finished our little dance!"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай, на доспехе которого красуется пара вмятин, гортанно смеется.{/n} "Ну же, что за промедление? Пора бы уже закончить наш маленький танец!"

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, whose armour is dented in a few places, lets out a guttural laugh.{/n} "What are you waiting for? It is about time we finished our little dance!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋身上的铠甲凹陷了好几处，喉咙里滚出一串低沉的笑声。{/n}“还在等什么呢？这支舞曲也该结束了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, whose armour is dented in a few places, lets out a guttural laugh.{/n} "What are you waiting for? It is about time we finished our little dance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋身上的铠甲凹陷了好几处，喉咙里滚出一串低沉的笑声。{/n}“还在等什么呢？这支舞曲也该结束了！”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, cuya armadura presenta ya varias mellas, deja escapar una risa gutural.{/n} «¿A qué estáis esperando? ¡Ya es hora de poner fin a esta danza!».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, whose armour is dented in a few places, lets out a guttural laugh.{/n} "What are you waiting for? It is about time we finished our little dance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, cuya armadura presenta ya varias mellas, deja escapar una risa gutural.{/n} «¿A qué estáis esperando? ¡Ya es hora de poner fin a esta danza!».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'armure de Marazhai est légèrement abîmée, mais il laisse échapper un rire guttural.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que vous attendez ? Reprenons notre petite danse ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, whose armour is dented in a few places, lets out a guttural laugh.{/n} "What are you waiting for? It is about time we finished our little dance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'armure de Marazhai est légèrement abîmée, mais il laisse échapper un rire guttural.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que vous attendez ? Reprenons notre petite danse ! »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai steht in verbeulter Rüstung da und lacht kehlig.{/n} "Worauf wartet Ihr? Es wird Zeit, dass wir unseren kleinen Tanz beenden!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, whose armour is dented in a few places, lets out a guttural laugh.{/n} "What are you waiting for? It is about time we finished our little dance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai steht in verbeulter Rüstung da und lacht kehlig.{/n} "Worauf wartet Ihr? Es wird Zeit, dass wir unseren kleinen Tanz beenden!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}ところどころ欠けたアーマーを身に着けたマラズハイは、小さく笑い声をあげた。{/n}「何をグズグズしてる？俺達のささやかなダンスパーティーを終わらせようじゃないか！」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, whose armour is dented in a few places, lets out a guttural laugh.{/n} "What are you waiting for? It is about time we finished our little dance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ところどころ欠けたアーマーを身に着けたマラズハイは、小さく笑い声をあげた。{/n}「何をグズグズしてる？俺達のささやかなダンスパーティーを終わらせようじゃないか！」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Zırhı birkaç yerden çöken Marazhai, boğuk bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Daha ne bekliyorsun? Minik dansımızı sonlandırmamızın vakti geldi de geçiyor bile!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, whose armour is dented in a few places, lets out a guttural laugh.{/n} "What are you waiting for? It is about time we finished our little dance!"
